title: A Moment of Silence
body:
When this is the first game of the day

http://imgur.com/0Ptnz2N

We've all been there... a moment of silence for all  the bros.

R.I.P

{{champion:131}}

replies.body:
Savage

but how do you lose that heavily to a {{champion:7}} as {{champion:131}}
got to have been intentional. Even a potato could get a kill on LB with diana.

I pretty much live here since all my elo is is intentionally feeding and trolling. 
That scores challenger compared to the s*** in my elo.
